subject: Missing Item
description_text:
Order #SSN3893

I recently ordered the Simsonn HB Pro handbrake as well as a few other items. The only item that did not arrive was the handbrake. I was hoping to get a little more information about the status of the shipment.

conversations.body_text: Hi AbraxosGaming,      I will check the shipping status of your handbrake order. The delay may be due to stock shortage, and I’ll confirm the details for you as soon as possible.
